title: No NOC from Railway Authority will be required wherever any construction is undertaken beyond 30 m from the Railway track boundary subject to the condition that no part of building shall project within 30 m from the Railway track boundary
clause_text: No NOC from Railway Authority will be required wherever any construction is undertaken beyond 30 m from the Railway track boundary subject to the condition that no part of building shall project within 30 m from the Railway track boundary.
section: Height restrictions in the vicinity of aerodromes
